en-US.description:
Ask for Critical Strikes and get the vivid description from the critical strike tables!

Dark Master will roll the dice and calculate the outcome for you. You only have to provide the severity and type of the critical. 

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Dark Master" or "Alexa, open Dark Master" .

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"

If you want a Critical Strike, just say: 
"Give me a pierce/blunt/fire/cut critical strike."
You will then be asked to specify the severity (superficial/light/moderate/grievous/lethal)
examplePhrases: Alexa ask Dark Master for a critical strike
en-US.name: Dark master
en-US.summary: Get critical strikes from the dark master himself
